channel.title: Linkin Park? Nirvana? Rock music anyone?
channel.description:
Linkin Park has to be my favorite rock/alternative band of all time, I can really feel their music because the way they sing the words just speak out to me and just touch my heart and make me sad and just want to ball up and cry and think about how I'm a disappointment to my family, but off of the darkness, I must also say I really love Nirvana as well, when I was listening to Nirvana a really attractive beautiful girl started talking to me about how she loved Nirvana and I asked her if she was a gamer and I was lucky enough for her to say yes and she literally has the same future career as me in programming that's how I met my girlfriend. Not sure if you really care but here's a sample of my favorite songs from the two artists.
Linkin Park: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kXYiU_JCYtU
Nirvana: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PbgKEjNBHqM
It would be nice if you posted some of your favorite rock songs.
